title: kotajikikox
author: kotajikikox
created_time: December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMLast edit: December 05, 2024, 04:04:32 AM by kotajikikox
content: For months it is all that we can talk about. Every bitcoiner dreamt of this day. We were all excited. Some of us lost hope. Some of us succumbed into FUD while some held on and continued to believe Bitcoin. Now it is here at last. Bitcoin today reaches $100k! I personally did not think it was going to happen this week because of the market moving sideways but Bitcoin never fails to surprise me. This is a monumental event and I do not think everyone was prepared for this right now. We thought it was going to happen by the end of the year or start of January but December 5th is finally when history was made.How excited/delighted are you? You are part of history and you can tell your grandkids about when bitcoin reached $100k right in front of our eyes. What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMHow excited/delighted are you? You are part of history and you can tell your grandkids about when bitcoin reached $100k right in front of our eyes. What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?I think most people are not going to tell their grandkids anything like this than to just say they remember when bitcoin got to $100000. What that makes this moment good is that you are having big bags in bitcoin so as the price increases, you make more money. Also some people will see it exciting as they do not want to spend their coins but leave it for their children to inherit the ones that they did not spend.

comments.author: bitLeap
comments.body: And the rise in Bitcoin price makes El Salvador the happiest country. Nayib Bukele uploaded a portfolio of the country's benefits from Bitcoin adoption. As a country, I think El Salvador has a special place in this year's end of year achievements. 100K will be a stepping stone or support level to go higher in the future.

comments.author: cymo880
comments.body: For those who’ve held onto their belief in Bitcoin through every wave of FUD, this moment proves resilience pays off. It solidifies Bitcoin's role not just as a speculative asset but as a legitimate financial revolution. The next chapter could very well be Bitcoin becoming a global reserve asset, paving the way for broader adoption of blockchain technologies.BTC

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: To me this is more than what you are holding in Bitcoin now. This is more than Bitcoin investment. I see Bitcoin crossing 100k milestone as a big win for Bitcoin adoption. I believe in Bitcoin but at some point this year I never thought Bitcoin would reach 100k anymore but every time I keep learning not to doubt Bitcoin.In between to those thinking it's too late to join in on Bitcoin and would prefer jumping on altcoins i would say the next best time to jump in on Bitcoin is now, you are safer here than any other altcoins, well make sure you always do your research.Cheers too 200k in a short time.

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: I don't know I think I was more excited when we were almost there Waking up seeing it above $100K made it meh Lol don't mind me though...... I already expected us crossing $100K this month. Definitely a milestone, first zero's in the 6 digit mark Congratulations to all who were able to see itMany started with us but are no more May their legacy continue to live on.

comments.author: Baki202
comments.body: Quote from: bitLeap on December 05, 2024, 09:25:19 AMAnd the rise in Bitcoin price makes El Salvador the happiest country. Nayib Bukele uploaded a portfolio of the country's benefits from Bitcoin adoption. As a country, I think El Salvador has a special place in this year's end of year achievements. 100K will be a stepping stone or support level to go higher in the future.When I saw this I almost went crazy because the amount of profit that there government would have made is just imagine, and some government are there wasting people time fighting bitcoin when others are using it to better there economy when I say this I felt very bad for my own government because this are things that are need but they are claiming placing ban on crypto, I wish I was the president right now, I would have put in place necessary arrangements for the next bear market because there is no way that money would not be made the government should learn about investment also. Because this are good opportunity and the government are missing on it and it's annoying me. And now that it as crossed 100k for sure there is more to come in the future. And that way people will keep profiting.

comments.author: AprilioMP
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMHow excited/delighted are you? You are part of history and you can tell your grandkids about when bitcoin reached $100k right in front of our eyes. What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?If I were to tell you how excited I am that Bitcoin has hit $100k, of course it’s not the same as those who sold it at $100k who may have held it for more than a year. I sold Bitcoin at a price below 90 assuming the price would correct again so that it would be an opportunity to buy back in. But the market said otherwise. Bitcoin went up to $100k.Part of history, yes. I am the one who will be part of the historic moment when Bitcoin is able to break through the price level above $100k in 2025.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMFor months it is all that we can talk about. Every bitcoiner dreamt of this day. We were all excited. Some of us lost hope. Some of us succumbed into FUD while some held on and continued to believe Bitcoin. Now it is here at last. Bitcoin today reaches $100k! $100,000 long awaited dream come through, this is amazing and no bitcoin holder that will not be excited about this, now we have many reasons to celebrate for this achievement and i think we can move on form here to more highs.Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMHow excited/delighted are you? You are part of history and you can tell your grandkids about when bitcoin reached $100k right in front of our eyes. What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?Am very excited on this, everyone of us as well feels positive on this great occasion of $100k achievement, my children are going to hear about the history of this as well as other people around me who will be interested in bitcoin adoption for a lifetime opportunity.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMFor months it is all that we can talk about. Every bitcoiner dreamt of this day. We were all excited. Some of us lost hope. Some of us succumbed into FUD while some held on and continued to believe Bitcoin. Now it is here at last. Bitcoin today reaches $100k! I personally did not think it was going to happen this week because of the market moving sideways but Bitcoin never fails to surprise me. This is a monumental event and I do not think everyone was prepared for this right now. We thought it was going to happen by the end of the year or start of January but December 5th is finally when history was made.Nothing is surprising about bitcoin again. It does its thing in its own way and no one can tell how the next move of it will be. The market moving sideways for some weeks now doesn’t mean that bitcoin does not have the potential to reach $100K. Just like it has become something of surprise, it will continue in that way for anytime it’s going to attain a new all time high. Now that bitcoin has reached this milestone and is now reason one a six figure price value, let’s see what becomes of the market soon, either a dump or a pump upward. A dump will simply means people may have lost faith of the market not going to continue the pump and we may be approaching the bear season soon. While an upward trajectory still means the bull run is still very much alive. The market is unpredictable, but let’s see what happen next by end of the year.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: It is obvious that bitcoin price has reached to the level and they expected point that people is looking for so I believe that this height bitcoin price reached I believe that decrease again to a lower version So the price will continue to increase above but let us not be surprised that Bitcoin price can change at any time it may be that from next year we can experience a downfall of Bitcoin so therefore I believe that Bitcoin is a something that we have to know that the price is not constant it is a regulatory kind of which nobody can predict exactly but nevertheless we are happy at the price increase to 100k and expecting more of the price to get another increase that is higher than 100k

comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMFor months it is all that we can talk about. Every bitcoiner dreamt of this day. We were all excited. Some of us lost hope. Some of us succumbed into FUD while some held on and continued to believe Bitcoin. Now it is here at last. Bitcoin today reaches $100k! It's a fantastic milestone and a slap on the faces of those who have always hated Bitcoin and tried to spread negativity about it. They must be so angry yet ashamed of themselves for being on the other side instead of embracing it at the right time and benefiting from it like others.Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMI personally did not think it was going to happen this week because of the market moving sideways but Bitcoin never fails to surprise me. This is a monumental event and I do not think everyone was prepared for this right now. We thought it was going to happen by the end of the year or start of January but December 5th is finally when history was made.I agree with that. I wasn't expecting Bitcoin to hit $100k before the new year started. I thought we were going to see it decline towards $90k or even below in December, and then it would start rebounding when the near year began, but to our surprise, it has reached the milestone before we were expecting it to.Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMHow excited/delighted are you? You are part of history and you can tell your grandkids about when bitcoin reached $100k right in front of our eyes. What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?I don't know if I can express my excitement in words. The first time when I saw Bitcoin's price, it was below $500 years back. I wasn't a member of this forum back then, nor did I know it existed. Today, I'm active and have witnessed it doing almost 99x from that time.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Yup! it's finally here and now at a decent range of 102k and I'm sure now we are heading towards the $111K That's quite an interesting number isn't it but anyway I can now finally say we are in the danger zone so book some profits so that we can accumulate more in a major correction towards 94k and than 89.7k.100k was a physiological resistance and now it can work as a support level too but it is too weak for now, 1M watch out prepare your bags and keep accumulating even though we are in booking zone.

comments.author: Sonia_123
comments.body: At last all hopes were achieve with Bitcoin reaching $100k this December without crossing to January,that means we should be expecting $150k and above from January, congratulations everyone for this long awaited achievement.After all the hustling and bustling here comes enjoyment.

comments.author: finaleshot2016
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMFor months it is all that we can talk about. Every bitcoiner dreamt of this day. We were all excited. Some of us lost hope. You are part of history and you can tell your grandkids about when bitcoin reached $100k right in front of our eyes. What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?Mixed feelings tbh 'cause recently some of my friends asking me about crypto again and where should they invest, Idk if it's too late or still early for another btc's growth but they ignored my calls during BTC dips so Idk what should I really tell them. Those people who believed about cryptocurrency really deserve the pump and those who are not, maybe it's not too late but probably not a huge growth in portfolio. But don't get me wrong, I'm happy with the current pump because my portfolio is green. Congrats everyone!

Some of us succumbed into FUD while some held on and continued to believe Bitcoin. Now it is here at last. Bitcoin today reaches $100k! What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?Nothing changed regarding on this milestone reached although this is good achievement so far reached by bitcoin still I would thrive to accumulate more since I think we are not done yet and bitcoin still promising years coming ahead.The $100k mark is strong statement that bitcoin is not an easy go asset.  Although not expecting to see this to happen right now then guess unexpected things happen with bitcoin.If some people want to sell then I will congratulate them that they earn. But for those people who continue to hodl lets have fun more with bitcoin for more years to come with this asset.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2024, 02:50:55 AMFor months it is all that we can talk about. Every bitcoiner dreamt of this day. We were all excited. Some of us lost hope. Some of us succumbed into FUD while some held on and continued to believe Bitcoin. Now it is here at last. Bitcoin today reaches $100k! I personally did not think it was going to happen this week because of the market moving sideways but Bitcoin never fails to surprise me. This is a monumental event and I do not think everyone was prepared for this right now. We thought it was going to happen by the end of the year or start of January but December 5th is finally when history was made.How excited/delighted are you? You are part of history and you can tell your grandkids about when bitcoin reached $100k right in front of our eyes. What were you doing or where were you when bitcoin reached $100k? and what does this now imply for the next few weeks for bitcoin?I wasn't expecting too that we'd see it this early and even though there's a dump that's happening now and Bitcoin pulls back to $94k-$95k. Everyone is happy to see that we're able to get into $100k+ for this day. The year hasn't ended yet but that seems to be the peak that we'll see for this 2024. And cheers to more for the next year to come because that's the most exciting part and whatever happens today might be look cute for next year and I am hoping that it will be and we'd see some more gains by that time.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Quote from: Sonia_123 on December 05, 2024, 07:53:06 PMAt last all hopes were achieve with Bitcoin reaching $100k this December without crossing to January,that means we should be expecting $150k and above from January, congratulations everyone for this long awaited achievement.After all the hustling and bustling here comes enjoyment.I'm not sure about what price we are going to end the year with, but since we have seen $100k already, $110k and $120k are easy to achieve, but $150k by January is possible, but the chance based on my calculations is a bit slim. In 2025 we might see a little delay in the price push-up; that's if Bitcoin sustains this $100k level till the end of December, January might just be another regular month for Bitcoin, or we will experience a little drop in the market, where I'm expecting the next move next year is from March; possibly we can achieve the $150k then.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: Ever-young on December 05, 2024, 11:24:38 PMI'm not sure about what price we are going to end the year with, but since we have seen $100k already, $110k and $120k are easy to achieve, but $150k by January is possible, but the chance based on my calculations is a bit slim. In 2025 we might see a little delay in the price push-up; that's if Bitcoin sustains this $100k level till the end of December, January might just be another regular month for Bitcoin, or we will experience a little drop in the market, where I'm expecting the next move next year is from March; possibly we can achieve the $150k then. Reaching 120k by this month or before this year end won't be easy. Even reaching 100k have some delay in reaching it but it is possible to reach. To achieve 150k price of bitcoin on January isn't high as you have said and as I explained that even getting to 100k which is we know that it is a milestone for bitcoin but having 6 digit price have delayed before it happened so for reaching 120k might not happen this year.
